titles.title: A resolution honoring the 50th anniversary of the National Cemetery Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
A resolution honoring the 50th anniversary of the National Cemetery Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the National Cemetery Administration on its 50th anniversary and commends the individuals who work for the administration.
